Give me a recipe for  chicken West Meatloaf

Recipe Name:
 Chicken West Meatloaf

Ingredients:
-    ground chicken    onion
-  panko  grated Parmesan cheese  fresh flat-leaf parsley  mayonnaise 3  garlic cloves
-  thyme leaves  Worcestershire sauce  kosher salt 1

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F 
2.  Stir together chicken, onion, panko, Parmesan cheese, parsley, mayonnaise, garlic, thyme, Worcestershire sauce, salt, garlic powder, and black pepper in a large bowl  Transfer mixture to the prepared loaf pan
3. Stir together ketchup, brown sugar, mustard, and vinegar 
4. Evenly spread ketchup mixture over the top of the meatloaf
5. Bake, uncovered, in  oven until t portion of meatloaf reads 165 degrees F , 50 to 55 minutes.

provide me a recipe for forest honey Garlic chicken

Recipe Name:
 Forest Honey Garlic Chicken

Ingredients:
-  2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil (or canola oil) 1 ½ pounds boneless
- skinless chicken breasts
- cut into small cubes (about ½ inch) Salt and black pepper 3 tablespoons honey 3 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce 3 cloves garlic
- minced ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional
- adjust for heat);Cooking Instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.  Lightly season the cubed chicken with salt and pepper. (Go easy because the soy sauce has plenty of sodium.) Add the chicken to the skillet and brown on one side
- about 3-4 minutes. Meanwhile
- make the glaze. Whisk the honey
- soy sauce
- garlic and red pepper flakes
- if using
- in a small bowl until well combined. Add the sauce to the pan and toss to coat the chicken pieces. Cook until chicken is cooked through
- 4-5 more minutes. Serve with steamed rice and top with green onions
- sesame seeds and a squeeze of lime juice
- if desired.

what is the recipe for Chennai breast chicken

Recipe Name:
 Marry Me Chicken

Ingredients:
-  Chicken breast – sliced into cutlets. You literally just slice them in half to make them thinner. If you use whole chicken breasts
- you’ll need to finish this off in the oven to make sure that they’re cooked through. But I like cutlets better in this recipe. Flour
- salt
- and pepper – you will dredge the chicken in flour for that lovely golden and crispy crust. Olive oil and butter – to brown the chicken I use olive oil and butter for flavor. You can even use the sundried tomato oil for extra flavor. That’s free flavor there! Garlic – because it makes everything taste better! Chicken or vegetable stock – I recommend using chicken stock
- but if all you have available is vegetable stock then that works perfectly fine.  Heavy cream and parmesan cheese – for a super creamy and flavorful sauce. Do not use single or light cream as it won’t thicken the sauce very well. Chili flakes
- dried oregano
- and thyme – for extra flavor. Sundried tomatoes – what makes this dish so special! Fresh basil leaves – for garnish

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Dredge the chicken in seasoned flour, and shake off any excess flour
2. Transfer to a plate but do not stack the chicken as they will stick to each other
3. In a heavy-bottomed pan on medium heat, heat the oil and melt the butter
4. Brown the chicken on both sides until it’s golden brown, transfer onto a warm plate, cover, and set aside
5. Saute the garlic for a minute or until it’s fragrant
6. Add the chicken stock, and deglaze the pan scraping any bits stuck to the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon
7. Add the heavy cream and the parmesan cheese to the skillet
8. Allow the sauce to simmer for a couple of minutes, then season with chili flakes and oregano
9. Season with salt and pepper to your taste, add the sundried tomatoes then put the chicken back in the sauce and let the sauce simmer and thicken for a few more minutes
10. Marry Me Chicken is now ready! Just garnish with chopped fresh basil leaves and serve warm over pasta or rice.

1.  Peel apple

Provide me a recipe for  chicken meatloaf

Recipe Name:
 Chicken Meatloaf

Ingredients:
-  cooking spray 1 pound ground chicken (white and dark meat) 1 small yellow onion
- finely chopped ½ cup panko (Japanese-style breadcrumbs) 1/4 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley 1/4 cup mayonnaise 3 cloves garlic cloves
- minced 2 teaspoons fresh thyme leaves 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce 1 1/4 teaspoons kosher salt 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 1/4 cup ketchup 2 teaspoons light brown sugar 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Lightly spray an 8-x 4-inch loaf pan with cooking spray
3. Stir together chicken, onion, panko, Parmesan cheese, parsley, mayonnaise, garlic, thyme, Worcestershire sauce, salt, garlic powder, and black pepper in a large bowl until just combined
4. Do not overmix
5. Transfer mixture to the prepared loaf pan
6. Stir together ketchup, brown sugar, mustard, and vinegar in a small bowl until combined
7. Evenly spread ketchup mixture over the top of the meatloaf
8. Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted into thickest portion of meatloaf reads 165 degrees F (73 degrees C), 50 to 55 minutes
9. Remove loaf from oven, and let rest 10 minutes before slicing and serving.

Give me a recipe using Quinoa and  chicken

Recipe Name:
 Quinoa Chicken

Ingredients:
-  2 cups chicken broth 1 cup quinoa 2 teaspoons vegetable oil
- or as needed ½ onion
- chopped  2 cloves garlic
- or to taste
- minced 1 ½ pounds ground chicken  1 ½ (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chile peppers

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Bring chicken broth and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan
2. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and water has been absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes
3. Meanwhile, heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
4. Sauté onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes
5. Add ground chicken

what is the recipe for chicken tikka masala

Give me a recipe for  chicken seekh kabab

Recipe Name:
 Chicken Seekh Kabab

Ingredients:
-  1 lb Ground Chicken ¼ onion (2 tbs or so chopped) 1 inch ginger 4-5 cloves garlic 2-4 green chilies ¼ cup cilantro 2 tbsp besan (chickpea flour) 1 tbsp yoghurt 1 tbsp butter 1 tsp salt 1 tsp chilli powder 1 tsp chilli flakes ½ tsp chaat masala ¾ tsp coriander powder ¾ tsp cumin powder ¾ tsp garam masala 1.5 tbsp lemon juice 1 tbsp butter 

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Add the onion, chilies, cilantro/coriander, green chilies, ginger and garlic to the bowl of a food processor and blitz till roughly chopped
2. Now add the remaining ingredients to the food processor and blend on high until a cohesive paste forms Grease your hands and shape into kababs either on skewers or without
3. I make mine 5-6 inches long
4. Barbecue: Preheat your grill to high, place kababs on the grill and cook covered for 4-5 minutes
5. Uncover, turn over and cook for another 2 minutes
6. Check one for doneness before removing the others from the grill!

3. Thread onto skewers and cook for about 20 minutes until golden on the outside and cooked through.

what are the steps in dhaba chicken gravy recipe

Recipe Name:
 Dhaba Style Chicken Gravy

Ingredients:
-  Chicken curry cut large pieces -500-600 gms Bay leaf -2 Green cardamom-4 Black cardamom-3 Cloves-4-5 Cinnamon -2 small pieces Mace-1 Black Peppercorns-10 Cumin Seeds- 1 tsp Star Anise-1 Curd-150 ml Turmeric- 1/2 tsp Red Chilli Powder- 2 tsp Kashmiri Chilli Powder- 2.5 tsp Coriander Powder- 2 tsp Garam Masala Powder- 1/2 tsp Onions
- sliced- 2 big (200 gms) Ginger garlic paste-2 tsp Oil- 4-5 tbsp Salt- 1 tsp Coriander leaves chopped- 4 tbsp

Cooking Instructions:
1. Cooking Instructions: Slice the onions and chop the coriander leaves
2. Whisk the curd and add the items specified
3. Mix again Heat oil in a kadai and add the whole spices
4. Give a stir and then add the sliced onions
5. Mix it and then add 1/2 tsp salt
6. Fry on medium to high heat for around 10-12 mins till the onions are light brown in colour
7. Now add the ginger garlic paste, give a mix and fry on low heat for 2-3 mins till raw smell is gone
8. Now switch off heat and once it’s cooled off completely add the curd-masala mix
9. Give a mix for around a minute and then switch on heat on low
10. Stir and cook on low heat for around another 2-3 mins till oil is separated
11. Now add the chicken pieces & 1/2 to 3/4 tsp salt, garam masala powder , mix and keep frying on high heat for around 7-8 mins till it’s fried and oil separates
12. Now add 250 ml water
13. Cover & cook on low heat for around 20 mins till chicken is tender Simmer for 2 mins Garnish with chopped coriander leaves
14. Serve with roti, naan or rice.

Give me a recipe for  chicken buna masala

Recipe Name:
 Chicken Bhuna Masala

Ingredients:
- Chicken (curry cut) - 1 kg Lemon Juice - ½ no Salt - 1 tsp Turmeric Powder - ½ tsp Coriander Seeds - 1 ½ tbsp Cumin Seeds - 2 tsp Fennel Seeds - ½ tsp Cinnamon - 2 inches Green Cardamom - 3 nos Black Cardamom - 1 no Black Peppercorn - 1 tsp Cloves - 3 nos Mace - 1 no Bayleaf - 1 no Oil - 4 tbsp Onion (finely chopped) - 1 ½ Cups Green Chilli (slit) - 3 nos Ginger Garlic Paste - 2 tbsp Kashmiri Chilli Powder - 1 tbsp Salt - 1 tsp Turmeric Powder - ¼ tsp Tomato (finely chopped) - 1 Cup Curd (beaten) - ¼ Cup Coriander Leaves - ¼ Cup Kasuri Methi - ½ tsp

Cooking Instructions:
1. Cooking Instructions: To the chicken, add lemon juice, salt and turmeric powder
2. Cover and rest until the other steps are done
3. Place a pan on the stove over medium-low heat
4. Add all the spices and saute for a few minutes until it turns aromatic
5. Allow it to cool down slightly, then grind it into a fine powder
6. Heat oil in a kadai/pan
7. Add onion and saute until it starts to turn golden brownAdd ginger garlic paste and green chilli
8. Saute for 2 minutes
9. Reduce the heat to low and add the red chilli powder, turmeric powder, salt and the prepared spice mix
10. Saute for a minute
11. Add the tomato and continue to cook until the tomatoes soften
12. Add the chicken and saute on high heat for 3-4 minutes
13. Reduce the flame to low, cover and cook for 5 minutes
14. At this point, the chicken will start releasing water
15. Add beaten curd and mix well
16. Cover and cook for 5 more minutes on low heat
17. Open the lid and cook on high heat, while stirring continuously, until the excess liquid gets evaporated
18. Add coriander leaves and Kasuri methi
19. Give it a final stir and remove from the heat
20. Serve with rice, roti or any Indian bread.

List ingredients and instruction recipe to cook  chicken 65

Recipe Name:
 Chicken 65

Ingredients:
-  1 kg Boneless Chicken chopped 2 tbsp Kashmiri Chilli Powder 2 tsp Turmeric Powder 1 tbsp Garam Masala Powder 3 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 4 tbsp Lemon Juice or Vinegar Salt to taste ½ cup Curd 2 tbsp Rice Flour 2 tbsp All Purpose Flour 2 tbsp Cornstarch ½ tsp Baking Power Curry leaves Oil for Deep Frying 1 Egg

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Mix all the ingredients except oil and flour
2. Leave it to marinate overnight
3. Now take the chicken out of fridge a hour before frying so it comes to room temp
4. Add in egg, rice flour, maida and cornflour
5. Mix well
6. Drop in hot oil and fry till golden
7. It will take around 7 to 10 mins depending on the size of the chicken
8. Drain it and serve hot with some fried curry leaves and lemon wedges.

what is the recipe for  chicken chesse balls

Recipe Name:
 Chicken Cheese Balls

Ingredients:
-  2 cup Chicken cooked and shredded 1 cup Mozzarella Cheese grated 2 tbsp Coriander Leaves finely chopped ½ tsp Dried Oregano ½ tsp Red Chilli Flakes 1 tsp Salt or to taste 1 cup Breadcrumbs 4 tbsp All Purpose Flour Water as needed for outer coating Oil for Deep Frying

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Take all the ingredients given for filling in a bowl and mix well to form a soft dough
2. Divide it into equal portions and shape into balls
3. Take 2 tblspn flour in a bowl, and 2 tblspn of flour in another bowl, add some water to one and make it into a thin paste
4. Now take breadcrumbs in a plate
5. Take one ball and roll it in flour, dip it in flour paste and coat with breadcrumbs
6. Now deep fry this till golden
7. Strain and serve.

Give me a recipe for chicken cutlet

Recipe Name:
 Chicken Cutlet

Ingredients:
-  1 tbsp Oil 1 medium Onions chopped finely 1 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 1 no Green Chilli chopped finely 1 tsp Chilli powder 2 tsp Coriander Powder 1 tsp Turmeric Powder 1 tsp Cumin Powder 1 tsp Garam Masala Powder 300 grams Minced Chicken 1 large Potato boiled and mashed 2 tbsp Breadcrumbs 2 tsp Salt 3 tbsp Coriander Leaves finely chopped 1 tsp Lemon Juice ¼ cup All Purpose Flour ½ cup Water 2 cups Breadcrumbs Oil for Shallow frying

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Heat oil in a pan and add in onions, saute till golden
2. Add in ginger garlic paste and green chillies
3. Saute for a min
4. Add in the salt and spice powders and mix well
5. Add in chicken mince and cook till the mince is cooked
6. Sprinkle in coriander leaves and mix
7. Take boiled potatoes in a bowl and mash it roughly
8. Add the cooked chicken mince and breadcrumbs and mix well
9. Your chicken cutlet filling is ready
10. Take small portion from it and shape it into a pattice
11. Set aside in fridge for minimum 15 minutes to 30 minutes to firm up
12. Mix flour with water to a runny liquid
13. Take breadcrumbs in a shallow plate and set aside
14. Now take the patties, dip the pattice in the flour batter and coat it in breadcrumbs
15. Place this in fridge for 30 minutes to firm up
16. Heat oil for shallow frying, drop the cutlet in hot oil and fry till golden on both sides
17. Strain onto some paper towel and set aside
18. Serve with ketchup.

Provide me a recipe for chicken chettinad

Recipe Name:
 Chicken Chettinad 

Ingredients:
-  500 grams Chicken Curry Cut 1 tsp Turmeric Powder Salt to taste 2 tbsp Lemon Juice 3 tbsp Gingelly Oil 2 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 3 sprig Curry Leaves 2 large Onions sliced thinly 2 medium Tomatoes cubed 3 tbsp Coriander Leaves 3 tbsp Coriander Seeds 5 Dry Red Chillies 1 tsp Fennel Seeds 1 tsp Cumin Seeds 1 piece Cinnamon 2 piece Kalpasi / Black Stone Flower  2 tsp Black Pepper 5 pods Cardamom 1 piece Star Anise 4 piece Cloves ¼ cup Fresh Coconut grated

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Add salt, turmeric powder and lemon juice to chicken and mix well
2. Let it marinate for 15 to 20 mins
3. Now Make the chettinad masala
4. Dry roast all the spices except coconut in a kadai till it turns golden
5. once it turn golden add in coconut and roast till the coconut turns light golden
6. Remove them to a mixer and grind them to a smooth paste
7. Heat oil in a pressure cooker, add in onions and saute till it turns soft
8. Add in curry leaves and ginger garlic paste
9. Saute for a min
10. Add in marinated chicken and mix well
11. Add in cubed tomatoes and mix well
12. Cover the cooker and cook it for 2 whistle, simmer for 10 mins
13. Switch off the heat and let them steam go all by itself
14. Open the cooker and pour the chicken in a kadai
15. Add more water if needed
16. Add the ground masala and mix well.Cover and simmer for 10 mins
17. Add in coriander leaves and serve.

How to cook pepper chicken gravy

Recipe Name:
 Pepper Chicken Gravy

Ingredients:
-  Chicken - 500 grams Coconut Oil - ¼ cup Bay Leaf - 1 Onion - 2 large sliced thinly Green Chilli - 2 slit Ginger Garlic Paste - 2 tblsp Tomatoes - 2 large chopped finely Turmeric Powder - 1 tsp Chilli powder - 2 tsp Garam Masala Powder - 2 tsp Salt to taste ▢Coriander Leaves for garnishing Oil - 1 tsp Fennel Seeds / Saunf / Sombu - 1 tblsp Cinnamon / Pattai - 1 stick Black Pepper - 1 tblsp Coriander Seeds - 2 tblsp Onion - 1 large chopped

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Pressure cook chicken with little salt for 2 to 3 whistle
2. Set aside
3. Heat little oil in a pot
4. Add in spices and toast them
5. Take it in a blender
6. Add onions and cook till golden brown
7. Add it with the spices and grind till smooth
8. Set aside
9. Heat oil in a pot, Add in onions, chillies and bay leaf
10. Cook till golden
11. Add in ginger garlic paste and cook till raw smell leaves
12. Add in tomatoes and cook till mushy
13. Add in ground masala and mix well
14. Add salt, turmeric powder, chilli powder and garam masala and cook till oil separates
15. Now add in chicken along with any cooking liquid
16. Mix well and simmer till oil separates
17. Add coriander leaves and serve.

How do I prepare Chilli chicken

Recipe Name:
 Chilli Chicken

Ingredients:
-  750 grams Chicken boneless ½ cup All Purpose Flour ½ cup Cornstarch Salt to taste 1 tsp Black Pepper 2 tsp Soy Sauce 1 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 3 tbsp Water Oil for deep frying 2 tbsp Butter 2 tbsp Ginger finely chopped 2 tbsp Garlic finely chopped 1 large Onions sliced thinly 2 slit Green Chilli 1 Capsicum sliced 3 tbsp Tomato Ketchup 3 tbsp Green Chilli Sauce 2 tsp Vinegar tsp Soy Sauce 2 tsp Red Chilli Powder ¼ cup Water 1 tsp Black Pepper Powder 3 Spring Onions finely chopped Salt to taste 1 tsp Sugar

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Start by frying some chicken
2. Take chicken in a bowl, add in flour, cornflour, salt, pepper, soy sauce, ginger garlic paste and water
3. mix well
4. Set aside for 10 mins
5. Heat some oil for deep frying, drop the chicken in and fry till golden, drain and set aside
6. Now make the sauce, heat some butter in a pan, add in ginger garlic and fry till golden
7. Add in onions
8. green chillies, salt and sugar
9. Add in capsicum and mix well
10. Add in red chilli powder, soy sauce, green chilli sauce, vinegar, ketchup and mix well
11. Add in water and cook till oil separates and thickens
12. Add in fried chicken and toss well
13. Add in black pepper and spring onion
14. Mix well
15. Serve hot.
You provide chicken recipes from a given list.
How to make chicken Samosa

Recipe Name:
 Chicken Samosa

Ingredients:
-  1 ½ cups all-purpose flour ½ tsp salt 2 tbsp vegetable oil ¾ cup plus 1 tbsp water 1 tbsp vegetable oil 1 medium onion finely chopped 1 tbsp grated ginger 1 tsp grated garlic 1 tsp salt divided 8 oz minced chicken ½ tsp ground cumin ½ tsp ground coriander ¼ tsp chili powder 1 tsp garam masala ¼ cup frozen green peas 2 green chillies chopped

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Combine flour and salt in large mixing bowl, then stir in oil
2. Add water, little by little, to form a workable dough
3. Form the dough into a ball and wrap in a damp kitchen towel to rest at room temperature for 30 minutes
4. Make the Filling Heat oil in a deep, heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat
5. Add the onion, ginger, garlic, and 1/2 tsp salt and stir
6. Cook for 2 minutes or until onion softens
7. Add ground chicken, remaining 1/2 tsp salt, cumin, coriander and chili powder
8. Cook 10 minutes, stirring occasionally
9. Sprinkle with garam masala and add frozen peas
10. Stir and cook 5 more minutes
11. Taste for salt and add more if needed
12. Add chopped chillies
13. Assemble the Samosas Divide the dough into 6 equal portions, then roll each into a smooth ball on a well-floured surface
14. Roll each ball into a thin, oblong shape, then use a knife to slice in half lengthwise to make a half-moon
15. Take one half in your hand, brush some water on the edges, and fold into an open cone shape, pressing edges to seal
16. Hold the cone and fill with about 2 tbsp chicken filling
17. Pinch to seal Allow it to sit on a cutting board to form a flat bottom
18. Finish shaping remaining samosas
19. Fry Samosas Pour the oil into a deep saucepan or dutch oven to a depth of 3 over medium heat
20. Fry the samosas in batches once the oil reaches about 200ºF
21. Fry for 15 minutes until golden, then increase heat to high and cook for 5 minutes at a hotter temperature until deep golden brown
22. Remove with a slotted spoon and place on paper towels to drain.
You provide chicken recipes from a given list.
Give me a recipe for Tandoori chicken

Recipe Name:
 Tandoori Chicken 

Ingredients:
-  5 (1130 g) chicken leg quarters
- skinless (~2.5 lb) 1/3 cup (82 g) plain
- whole-milk Greek yogurt 2 tbsp neutral oil
- such as grapeseed oil 2 tbsp melted butter
- salted or unsalted both work (sub more oil) 2 tbsp lemon juice 6-8 garlic cloves
- 1 tbsp heaped
- finely chopped/crushed 1 inch piece ginger
- 1 tbsp heaped
- finely chopped/crushed 1 tbsp tomato paste 1 tbsp Kashmiri chili powder
- sub paprika 2 tsp coriander powder 2 tsp cumin powder 1 1/2 tsp red chili powder or cayenne
- 1 tsp for less heat 1 tsp garam masala 
- or store-bought Tandoori Masala 1/2 tsp turmeric powder 1/2 tsp ground black pepper 1 tbsp dried fenugreek leaves (crushed)
- 2 1/2 tsp kosher salt 1/8 tsp sugar
- pinch deep orange or red food color
- finely chopped cilantro lemon or lime wedges thinly sliced red onion

Cooking Instructions:
1.  Prep Chicken: Use a sharp knife to make 4 (2-3 inch) deep slits across the meat side of the chicken pieces
2. Turn over and cut another 2-3 slits on the underside
3. In a bowl large enough to fit the chicken, combine all the ingredients listed under Tandoori Marinade
4. Toss the chicken pieces to coat, making sure to get in the cuts and crevices (I use kitchen gloves to do this)
5. Cover and refrigerate for at least 6 hours, up to 48 hours (the longer the better!)
6. When ready to prepare, take out of the fridge and allow to come closer to room temperature
7. Preheat the oven to 75°F/190°C
8. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil
9. Place a baking rack on the parchment or aluminum foil-lined baking sheet
10. Lightly grease the rack with baking spray
11. (If you don’t have a rack, lightly grease the parchment paper or aluminum.) Place the leg quarters meat side up on the baking sheet/rack
12. Reserve the excess marinade
13. Bake for 30 minutes, flipping the pieces midway, until cooked through (165°F/73.9°C)
14. Turn on the Broil Function to High (550°F/288°C)
15.  Remove the chicken from the oven and flip the chicken once again so the meaty side is on top
16. Brush/baste the remaining marinade over the chicken pieces
17. Place back in the oven and broil for 4-5 minutes, until lightly charred (timing will depend on your oven)
18. If not charred within 6 minutes, move your oven rack on the top shelf so it’s close to the heat source
19. Continue to broil for another 1-2 minutes
20. Remove from the oven and allow to rest for 5 minutes
21. Garnish with cilantro, serve with lemon and thinly sliced red onion.

how to cook me a recipe for Dry pepper chicken

Add in spices and toast them. Add onions, chillies and bay leaf. Cook till golden. Add in ginger garlic paste and cook till raw smell leaves. Give me a recipe for Chicken 65 Briyani

Recipe Name: Chicken 65 Biriyani; Ingredients : Ghee - ¼ cup Onion - ½ kg Ginger garlic paste -1 tblspn Chilli powder - 2 tsp Green chillies - 4 Garam masala powder - 2 tsp Turmeric powder - 1 tsp Water - ½ cup Salt to taste Coriander leaves - 1 cup chopped finely Mint leaves - 1 cup chopped finely Milk - 3 tblspn Curd ¼ cup Saffron a pinch Yellow food colour as needed For Marination-Chicken - 1 kg cut into small piece Chilli Powder - 1 tblspn Coriander Powder - 1 tblspn Cumin Powder - 2 tsp Turmeric Powder - 1 tsp Ginger Garlic Paste - 2 tblspn Curd / Yogurt - ½ cup Salt to taste Garam Masala Powder - 2 tsp Oil for deep frying; Cooking Instructions : Mix all ingredients for marination. Set aside. Soak rice for 30 mins.Heat lots of water in a pot for cooking rice. Add in salt. Add rice and cook for 6 to 8 mins till rice is half cooked. Drain and set aside. Heat oil and ghee in a pot. Add in onions and cook till golden. Add in ginger garlic paste and saute them for 2 mins. Add chillies, spice powders, curd and mix well. Add salt and mix well. Now add in half of the marinated chicken and mix well. Add in water and coriander leaves and mint leaves. Layer rice on top. Add in coriander and mint leaves. Add in saffron soaked in milk along with some food colour. Top with ghee and cover it. Place it on lowest heat possible and cook for 30 to 35 mins. Remove and fluff up the rice. Fry the remaining chicken pieces in hot oil. In a bowl, place fried chicken 65 pieces, then top with rice. Invert the bowl into a plate and serve.

how to make Spicy Chicken chops

Give me a recipe for Kadai chicken

Recipe Name: Kadai Chicken; Ingredients : 1 kg Chicken 2 large Onions peeled and sliced 2 no Tomato chopped finely 1 no Bell Pepper chopped 2 no Green chillies slit 2 tbsp Ginger Garlic paste 2 tsp Garam masala powder 1 cup Cream 2 tbsp Oil 3 tbsp Coriander leaves for garnishing 1 tbsp Ginger peeled, julienned for garnishing Salt to taste For Roasting - 7 no Dry Red chilli 3 tbsp Coriander seeds; Cooking Instructions : In an oil less frying pan,add dry red chilli and coriander seeds and fry till it is nicely toasted.Remove it from the pan..let it cool down then grind it into a powder. In a  kadai add oil and heat it up,then add in onions and stir well. Cook until golden brown. Add in tomatoes and green chilli and cook until the tomato is mushy. Add in ginger garlic paste and mix well.Now put in the powdered spice and mix well. Add in the chicken pieces,Season with salt and stir well. Cook for 20-25 mins until the chicken is cooked. Add the capsicum in. Add in the garam masala powder and mix well. Now pour in the cream. Garnish with coriander leaves and julienned ginger pieces. Serve hot with rice or anything.

How do in prepare Chatpate chicken

Recipe Name: Chatpate Chicken; Ingredients : 2 tbsp Oil 1 tbsp Butter 1 large Boneless Chicken Breast cubed 3 tbsp Cornstarch ⅙ cup Cashews 6 cloves Garlic peeled and crushed 3 no Dry Red Chilli broken 1 large Onion sliced thinly ½ large Green Bell pepper sliced thinly 1 tsp Salt to taste 1 tbsp Kashmiri Chilli Powder 1 tsp Garam Masala Powder 1 tsp Turmeric Powder 2 tsp Chat Masala Powder 1 tsp Lemon Juice 3 tbsp Coriander leaves; Cooking Instructions : Mix chicken with cornstarch and set aside. Heat oil in a nonstick pan and drop chicken in and cook for 2 to 3 mins till it is done. Drain and set aside. In the same pan, add some butter and add cashews, garlic and chillies. Cook till golden. Add in onions, capsicum along with salt and saute till lightly golden. Add in spice powders and mix well. Add in chicken and toss in the spices. Add a splash of water and mix well. Add lemon juice and coriander leaves and toss well. Serve.

Give me a recipe for chicken Alfredo

Recipe Name: Chicken Alfredo; Ingredients : 400 grams Penne 1 tbsp Salt Water as needed For Cooking Chicken 2 tbsp Olive Oil 2 large Chicken Breast Boneless 1 tbsp Italian Seasoning 2 tsp Lemon Juice 1 tsp Salt 1 tbsp Butter For Alfredo Sauce 4 tbsp Butter 3 tbsp Garlic chopped finely 1 no Dry Red Chillies (optional) I used dried mini chillies 1½ cup Milk 2 cups Cream ¾ cup Parmesan Cheese grated 1 tsp Salt 1 tsp Black Pepper Powder 2 tbsp Parsley chopped finely; Cooking Instructions : Take your boneless chicken onto a cutting board. Slice it in the middle to open it like a book or butterfly the chicken. Cut the chicken into two slices. Season the chicken with Italian seasoning or any of your favourite seasoning, lemon juice, salt on both sides. Set aside. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a pan. Add in chicken in the pan. Cook on medium heat for 2 mins. Flip over and cook on other side for few more minutes. Now add in tbsp of butter and mix into the chicken. Remove to a plate and set aside so it rest for few minutes. Slice the chicken into strips and set aside. Cooking the pasta Bring lots of water to a full boil. Add in salt generously. Add pasta in the water and cook pasta in boiling salted water. Cook as per package directions. Making the sauce for Alfredo Now in the same pan as you cooked the chicken. Add butter in the same pan. Add in garlic, dry red chillies and saute for 30 seconds. Reduce the heat and pour in milk, cream and mix well. Add in the parmesan cheese and mix till combined. The sauce will emulsify and gets creamy as you mi in the cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Add in chopped parsley and mix well. Finishing pasta Add in cooked pasta and the cooked chicken in. Mix everything well and lower the flame. Take it off the heat. Plate up your pasta, Add more cheese when serving.

Give me instructions to cook chicken Salna

Recipe Name: Chicken Salna; Ingredients : 3 tbsp Coconut Oil 1 large Onions sliced thinly 3 no Green Chillies slit 2 large Tomatoes chopped finely 1 tbsp Kashmiri Chilli Powder 2 tbsp Coriander Powder 1 tsp Turmeric Powder 1 tsp Cumin Powder 2 tsp Salt 500 grams Chicken bone-in 2 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 3 tbsp Coriander Leaves finely chopped Water as needed For Roasting & Grinding 1 tsp Coconut Oil 1 stick Cinnamon 1 tbsp Fennel Seeds 4 no Cardamom 2 no Cloves 1 cup Fresh Coconut - 1 cup grated grated 3 tbsp Poppy Seeds or use Cashews; Cooking Instructions : Heat 1 tsp of oil in a kadai. Add in all roasting ingredients and roast till light golden. Remove it to a blender and make it into a smooth puree. Set aside. Heat 3 tbsp oil in a pressure cooker. Add in onions, chillies and saute till golden. Add in ginger garlic paste and cook for a min. Add in tomatoes and salt. Cook till it gets mushy. Add in spice powders and mix well. Add in chicken and mix well in the masala for 5 minutes. Add 1 cup of water. Cover and pressure cook for 2 whistle, simmer the flame and cook for 10 mins. Turn off the heat and let the steam go all by itself. Open the cooker, add in coconut masala and mix well. Pour in more hot water to adjust the consistency of the gravy. Simmer on low for 10 to 15 mins till you see a thin layer of oil floating on top. Garnish with coriander leaves. Serve.

how to make delcious chicken stew

Recipe Name: Chicken Stew; Ingredients : 500 grams Chicken 1 large Onions sliced thinly 5 no Green chillies slit 2 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 2 cups Coconut milk (Thin - Second Extract) 1 cup Coconut milk ( Thick - First Extract) 50 grams Cashews Salt to taste 2 tbsp Coriander leaves chopped finely For tempering 1 tsp Cumin Seeds 1 piece Cinnamon 1 no Bay Leaf 3 no Cardamom crushed; Cooking Instructions : Soak cashews in warm water for 15 mins. Now take this in a blender and make it into a fine puree. Heat oil in a pressure cooker, add in cumin seeds, cardamom, bay leaf and cinnamon. Let it sizzle for a min. Add in ginger and garlic and mix well. Add in onions, green chillies and salt. Fry till light golden. Add in chicken and saute till it gets well seared. Now add in thin coconut milk, salt and mix well. Now cover the cooker and cook for 3 whistle, simmer the flame and cook for another 5 mins. Now switch off the flame and let the steam escape all by itself. Now open the cooker and add in cashew paste and mix well. Simmer for few mins. Finally pour in thick coconut milk and coriander leaves. Simmer for 2 minutes and turn off the heat.

Give me a recipe for Dahi chicken

Recipe Name: Dahi Chicken; Ingredients : For Dahi Chicken Sauce 2 tbsp Oil or Ghee 1 tsp Cumin Seeds 1 stick Cinnamon 2 large Onions sliced thinly 3 slit Green Chillies 2 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 1 Curd 2 tsp Cumin Powder 1 tsp Chilli Powder 2 tsp Garam masala powder 1 tbsp Kasuri Methi Leaves 4 tbsp Coriander leaves chopped finely For Chicken 500 grams Chicken (bone-in) 1 tsp Turmeric Powder 1 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste Salt to taste 2 tbsp Oil; Cooking Instructions : Take curd in a bowl, use a whisk to mix till smooth and creamy. Set aside till use. Heat 2 tblsp oil in a pan, add chicken, along with salt, ginger garlic paste and turmeric powder. Saute this on high heat till chicken is seared on all sides. It will take around 7 to 8 minutes. Remove to a bowl. Set aside. In the same pan, add 2 more tblsp of oil, add cumin and cinnamon. Add onions, and saute till golden brown. Add green chillies and ginger garlic paste and saute till raw smell leaves. Now add in all spice powder and salt. Mix well. Add chicken back in and toss well with the masala. Take it off the heat, pour in whisked curd and mix well. Now turn on the heat. Cover and simmer for 25 to 30 minutes till chicken is cooked. Add kasuri methi leaves, coriander leaves and mix well. Serve.

How to cook Methi chicken

Recipe Name: Methi Chicken; Ingredients : Oil - 4 tblsp Shahi Jeera - 1 tsp Onion - 2 large chopped finely Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tblsp Green Chilli - 2 slit Tomato - 3 pureed Chicken - 500 grams Chilli powder - 2 tsp Kashmiri Chilli Powder - 1 tblsp Turmeric Powder - 1 tsp Cumin Powder - 1 tsp Coriander Powder - 2 tsp Garam Masala Powder - 1 tsp Kasuri Methi Leaves - ½ cup Yogurt - ½ cup Coriander leaves a handful chopped finely Salt to taste; Cooking Instructions : Heat oil in a pan, add shahi jeera. Add onions and cook till golden brown. Add in ginger garlic paste and chillies. Saute for a min. Add in tomato puree and cook till oil separates. Add in chicken and stir well Add in salt and spice powders and mix well. Add water and cook chicken for 15 to 20 mins. Now add in whisked yogurt and mix well. Simmer for 10 mins. Add in methi leaves and mix well. Add in garam masala powder and coriander leaves and mix well. Serve.

Detailed cokking instructions for Ghee Chicken Curry

Recipe Name: Ghee Chicken Curry; Ingredients : Ghee - ¼ cup Chicken - ½ kg Salt to taste Turmeric Powder - 1 tsp Curd - ½ cup Onion - 2 large sliced thinly Green Chillies - 2 slit Curry leaves - 2 sprig Tomatoes - 2 chopped finely Tamarind pulp - 1 tblsp Water as needed Salt to taste Garam Masala Powder - 1.5 tblsp Coriander leaves a handful finely chopped TO DRY ROAST & GRIND Kashmiri Chilli Powder - 2 tblsp Coriander Powder - 2 tblsp Turmeric Powder - 1 tsp Cumin Powder - 2 tsp Garlic - 6 to 8 cloves; Cooking Instructions : Take chicken, yogurt, salt and turmeric powder in a bowl and mix well. Set aside for 30 mins. Take spice powders in a dry pan and toast for 2 to 3 mins. Take it in a blender and add garlic. Grind to a smooth puree. Heat ghee in a pan, add in curry leaves. Add onions, chillies and salt and saute till golden. Add in chicken and mix well. Cook for 10 mins. Add in tomatoes and cook till mushy. Now add in the ground masala, tamarind and water and mix well. Cook for 10 to 15 mins. Add garam masala powder and mix well. Cook till oil separates from the curry. Add in coriander leavers and mix well and serve.

How to prepare Chicken Capsicum Curry

Recipe Name: Chicken Capsicum Curry; Ingredients :Chicken - ½ kg cut into small pieces Onion - 1 large chopped Tomatoes - 2 large chopped Capsicum - 1 cubed Ginger garlic paste - 1 tblspn Chilli powder - 2 tsp Coriander powder - 1 tblspn Garam masala powder - 1 tsp Turmeric powder - 1 tsp Pepper powder - 1 tsp Cinnamon - 1 small piece Fennel Seeds - 1 tblspn Curry leaves - 1 spring Cilantro - for garnishing Lemon juice - 1 tblspn Oil - 2 tblspn Salt to taste; Cooking Instructions : Take a pressure cooker, add 1 tblspn of oil and heat it up. Add in cinnamon and fennel seeds and saute for a min. Add in onions, curry leaves and saute till they turn light brown. Add in all the spice powders, salt and ginger garlic paste and mix well. Throw in tomatoes and cook for 5 mins till they turn mushy. Add in the cut chicken pieces and mix well with the masala. Pour in ½ cup of water and cover the pressure cooker. Let it cook for 4 whistle. Simmer the flame and let it cook for 5 mins. Switch off the flame and let the pressure go all by itself. Now heat 1 tblspn of oil in a kadai. Add in capsicum and cook for a min on high heat. Add in the cooked chicken mixture and toss well with the oil. Add in pepper powder and toss again. Throw in lots of coriander leaves and squeeze in some lemon juice. Toss everything well. Serve with rice.

Give me a instructions to cook Masala Fried Chicken

Recipe Name: Masala Fried Chicken; Ingredients : Chicken - 500 Grams cut into small pieces (not too small) Coriander Leaves - 1 cup packed Mint Leaves - 1 cup packed Curry leaves - ½ cup packed Green Chillies - 7 to 8 Ginger - 2 tbsp paste or 4 cm piece Garlic - 2 tbsp paste or 10 cloves Thick Unsour curd - ½ cup Garam Masala Powder - 1 tbsp Lemon Juice - 2 tbsp Rice Flour - ½ cup Oil for Deep frying Salt to taste; Cooking Instructions : Take coriander, mint, curry leaves, green chillies, ginger, garlic in a blender and puree till smooth. Take this masala in a bowl, add in curd, salt, lemon juice, garam masala powder and mix well. Add in chicken and mix well. Leave this to marinate in fridge for 3 to 4 hours or overnight. Take the chicken out of fridge 1 hour before you fry. Add in rice flour and mix well. Heat oil for deep frying and drop the chicken in and fry on low medium heat for 20 mins. Now increase the heat and fry for 5 mins. Drain and serve.

Give me a recipe for Schezwan Fried Chicken

Recipe Name: Schezwan Fried Chicken; Ingredients : Boneless Chicken Breast - 2 large cubed Dry Red Chilli - 4 to 5 Garlic - 5 to 6 cloves Vinegar - 1 tblspn Soy Sauce - 2 tsp Salt to taste Pepper Powder - 1 tsp All Purpose Flour - 2 tblspn Cornflour - 3 tblspn Sesame Seeds as needed Oil for deep frying; Cooking Instructions : Soak dry red chillies in warm water for 10 mins, Now drain and take it in a blender add garlic to it and puree smooth. Now take chicken in a bowl, add in the chilli paste, and other ingredients except sesame seeds and mix well. Heat oil for deep frying. Now take each chicken piece and coat with the sesame seed mix and fry in hot oil till golden for 2 to 3 mins. Now drain them and serve.

How to cook Baked Crispy Chicken Breast with Pineapple Salsa

Recipe Name: Baked Crispy Chicken Breast with Pineapple Salsa; Ingredients : For chicken - Boneless Chicken Breast - 2 Olive Oil - 2 tblspn Salt to taste Red Chilli flakes to taste Panko Breadcrumbs - 1 cup Parmesan Cheese - 3 tblspn (optional)  For Pineapple Salsa - Pineapples - 2 cups chopped into small pieces Red Bell Pepper - ¼ cup chopped finely Green Chilli - 1 deseeded and chopped finely Coriander Leaves - 2 tblspn finely chopped Lemon Juice - 1 tblspn Salt to taste Sugar - 1.5 tblspn or to taste ; Cooking Instructions : Preheat oven to 200 degree C. Take a baking pan and add 1 tblspn of oil to it and spread evenly. Now pop this in oven and let it heat up for 10 to 15 mins. First lets make the pineapple salsa. Take all the ingredients in a bowl and toss well. Set aside till serving. Now take the chicken and pat it dry, slit it open so each chicken gives you two chicken breast. Now season this with salt and chilli flakes and rub on both sides of the chicken. Now drizzle 1 tblspn of oil over it and set aside. In a plate take panko crumbs. Dip each chicken in the crumbs and coat on both sides. Now sprinkle the top with parmesan cheese. Now take the hot baking pan from oven, take the chicken and place it on the pan. Pop it back in oven and cook for 15 mins, now flip over and cook for another 5 mins. Now remove this from oven and serve with pineapple salsa.

Give me a recipe for Creamy Garlic Chicken

Recipe Name: Creamy Garlic Chicken; Ingredients : 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts 1 lb 1/2 tsp Italian seasoning 1/2 tsp salt 1/4 tsp freshly cracked black pepper 1/4 cup all-purpose flour 2 Tbsp olive oil 2 Tbsp butter, divided 1 whole garlic bulb 1 cup chicken broth 3/4 cup heavy cream 1/2 tsp garlic powder Salt and Pepper to taste; Cooking Instructions : Using a sharp knife, carefully fillet each chicken breast into two thinner cutlets. Season each breast with Italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper. Then sprinkle the flour over both sides of the chicken breasts and rub it in until the chicken is evenly coated. Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add the olive oil and 1 Tbsp of butter. Once the skillet is hot, add the chicken and cook on each side until golden brown and cooked through (about 4 minutes per side). Remove the cooked chicken to a clean plate and cover to keep warm. While the chicken is cooking, peel the garlic cloves and then carefully smash them with the side of a large chef's knife by pressing down on the side of the knife with the heel of your hand. Once the chicken is removed, to the same skillet add the remaining 1 Tbsp of butter, then add the garlic cloves. Turn the heat down to medium-low and sauté the garlic for 3 minutes or until lightly browned and fragrant. Make sure to stir the garlic frequently to prevent it from burning. Next pour the chicken broth and heavy cream into the skillet, then add the garlic powder. Stir and scrape up any brown bits from the bottom of the skillet. Allow the sauce to simmer in the skillet for 8-10 minutes, or until it has reduced and thickened by about 50%. Taste the sauce at this point and add salt and pepper if needed. Finally, return the cooked chicken breasts to the skillet and spoon the creamy sauce over top. Allow the chicken to heat through. Serve with fresh chopped parsley and enjoy!.

How to prepare Chicken Lollipop

Recipe Name: Chicken Lollipop; Ingredients : 12 pieces Chicken Lollipop Oil for Deep Frying For Marination - 1 tbsp Chilli Garlic Paste 1 tbsp Ginger Paste 1 tbsp Garlic Paste 1 tsp Kashmiri Chilli Powder 1 tsp Black Pepper Powder Salt to taste 1 tbsp Soy Sauce 1 tbsp White Vinegar 3 tbsp Tomato ketchup 3 tbsp Cornstarch 3 tbsp All Purpose Flour 1 no Egg; Cooking Instructions : Mix chicken lollipop with all the marinating ingredients except cornstarch, plain flour and egg. Keep aside for 30 minutes to marinate. Just before frying add in cornstarch, egg and all purpose flour. Mix well. Heat oil for deep frying. Once the oil is hot, Drop chicken in hot oil, simmer the flame and cook on low heat for 10 mins till the chicken is cooked, Now increase the heat and fry the chicken on high heat for 5 mins or till the chicken get crispy and cooked. Strain and serve..

what is the recipe for Dragon Chicken

Recipe Name:  Dragon Chicken; Ingredients : 500 grams Boneless Chicken Breast cut into thin strips 2 tbsp Coriander leaves finely chopped Oil for Deep frying For Marination - 2 tsp Dark Soy Sauce 2 tbsp Chilli garlic paste 1 Egg ½ cup All Purpose Flour ¼ cup Corn Starch 1 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste Salt to taste 1 tsp Pepper ¼ tsp Ajinomoto For Sauce - 2 tbsp Oil 3 no Dry Red Chilli 2 tbsp Cashews 1 large Onion sliced thinly 1 large Capsicum sliced thinly 1 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 1 tbsp Chilli garlic paste 2 tsp Dark Soy sauce ¼ cup Tomato Ketchup Salt to taste ¼ tsp Ajinomoto 2 tsp Sugar; Cooking Instructions : Take chicken in a bowl and add all the marination ingredients. Mix well and let it marinate for 15  mins. Now heat some oil for deep frying. When the oil is hot drop the chicken in oil and fry till golden. Strain and set aside. Now heat oil in a frying pan. Add in dry red chilli and cashews and fry till the cashew turn golden brown. Now add in onions and bell peppers and toss well in the oil. Add in ginger garlic paste and saute for a min. Now add in red chilli paste, soy sauce, tomato ketchup, salt, ajinomoto, sugar and mix well. Cook this for a couple of mins till the water evaporates and sauce thickens. Now add in the fried chicken and toss well in the sauce. Add in chopped coriander or spring onions and mix well. Serve hot.

How to prepare Japan Chicken

Recipe Name: Japan Chicken; Ingredients : 1 tbsp Butter 10 cloves Garlic chopped 5 Green chillies slit 2 cups Milk ¼ cup Cashew (Powdered) Salt to taste 1 tsp White pepper powder ½ tsp Sugar For Chicken - 500 grams Chicken preferably boneless Salt to taste 1 tsp White Pepper powder 2 tbsp All Purpose flour 4 tbsp Cornflour Oil for deep frying; Cooking Instructions : Take chicken in a bowl. Add in salt, white pepper powder and mix well. Add cornflour, maida and little water and mix really well to form a thick mass. Heat oil for deep frying. Drop chicken in hot oil and fry till golden brown around 5 to 6 mins. Drain on a paper towel and set aside. Now make the sauce. Heat butter in a pan. Add in garlic and saute for few seconds. Add in green chillies and mix well. Pour in milk, cashew powder, salt sugar and white pepper. Mix well. Add in the fried chicken and coat well in the sauce. Let the chicken cook in the sauce for 3 to 4 mins. The sauce will thicken and coat the chicken. Serve hot.

Give me a recipe for Chicken Clear Soup

Recipe Name: Chicken Clear Soup; Ingredients : For Clear Stock (Broth) - 500 grams Chicken (bone-in & skin-on) 1 large Carrot cut into chunks 1 large Onion cut into chunks 1 inch Ginger peeled & sliced thinly 6 cloves Garlic 2 tbsp Chicken Bouillon Powder 1 Litre Water ½ tsp Salt ½ tsp Black Pepper (coarsely crushed) For Chicken Clear Soup - 2 tbsp Cornstarch ¼ cup Water 4 tbsp Green Onions (Spring Onions) 1 small Red Chilli (optional); Cooking Instructions : For Clear Stock (Broth) Cook the chicken in a pot for long time and extract the stock as much flavour from the chicken. Pour the stock back into the pan and bring it to a boil. Add the shredded chicken and heat through. Mix cornstarch with some water to form a slurry. Now pour the cornflour slurry in the soup and mix well till it thicken a bit. Garnish with chopped green onions, chopped red chillies, salt and pepper to taste. Ladle  in a soup bowl and Serve piping hot.

Cooking instructions for preparing Spicy Chicken Soup

Recipe Name: Spicy Chicken Soup; Ingredients : Oil - 1 tblsp Leeks or Onions - 1 chopped finely Carrot - 1 cut thinly Capsicum - 1 cut thinly Mushrooms - 10 sliced thinly Ginger garlic paste - 1 tblsp Tomatoes - 2 pureed Chicken stock - 6 cups Chilli powder to taste Black pepper powder to taste Dried Oregano - 1 tsp Dried basil - 1 tsp Dried parsley - 1 tsp Salt to taste Cooked chicken - 2 cups chopped; Cooking Instructions : Heat oil in a pot. Add in leeks and saute for 30 seconds. Add in carrots, capsicum and mushrooms. Saute for 2 to 3 mins. Add in ginger garlic paste and mix well. Add in chicken stock, tomato puree, chilli powder, salt, parsley, oregano, basil and pepper powder. Boil this for 5 mins. Now add in cooked chicken and mix well. Simmer for 2 mins. Serve hot.
